verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> now these דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> Now these [are] the words הַסֵּ֔פֶר <S%H5612><s%> of the letter אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁלַ֛ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יִרְמְיָ֥ה <S%H3414><s%> that Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet מִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יֶ֜תֶר <S%H3499><s%> unto the residue זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> of the elders הַגּוֹלָ֗ה <S%H1473><s%> which were carried away captives וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <S%H3548><s%> and to the priests וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַנְּבִיאִים֙ <S%H5030><s%> and to the prophets וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and to all the people אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֶגְלָ֧ה <S%H1540><s%> had carried away captive נְבֽוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֛ר <S%H5019><s%> whom Nebuchadnezzar מִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> to Babylon

אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> (After צֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> were departed יְכָנְיָֽה־ <S%H3204><s%> that Jeconiah הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְהַגְּבִירָ֨ה <S%H1377><s%> and the queen וְהַסָּרִיסִ֜ים <S%H5631><s%> and the eunuchs שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> the princes יְהוּדָ֧ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem וְהֶחָרָ֥שׁ <S%H2796><s%> and the carpenters וְהַמַּסְגֵּ֖ר <S%H4525><s%> and the smiths מִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem

בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> By the hand אֶלְעָשָׂ֣ה <S%H501><s%> of Elasah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָ֔ן <S%H8227><s%> of Shaphan וּגְמַרְיָ֖ה <S%H1587><s%> and Gemariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חִלְקִיָּ֑ה <S%H2518><s%> of Hilkiah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom שָׁלַ֜ח <S%H7971><s%> sent צִדְקִיָּ֣ה <S%H6667><s%> (whom Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֛ר <S%H5019><s%> to Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> unto Babylon בָּבֶ֥לָה <S%H894><s%> of Babylon לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying ס

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַ֨גּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> unto all that are carried away captives אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom הִגְלֵ֥יתִי <S%H1540><s%> whom I have caused to be carried away מִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> unto Babylon

בְּנ֥וּ <S%H1129><s%> Build בָתִּ֖ים <S%H1004><s%> ye houses וְשֵׁ֑בוּ <S%H3427><s%> and dwell וְנִטְע֣וּ <S%H5193><s%> [in them] and plant גַנּ֔וֹת <S%H1593><s%> gardens וְאִכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> and eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּרְיָֽן׃ <S%H6529><s%> the fruit

קְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> Take נָשִׁ֗ים <S%H802><s%> ye wives וְהוֹלִידוּ֮ <S%H3205><s%> and beget בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנוֹת֒ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters וּקְח֨וּ <S%H3947><s%> and take לִבְנֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H1121><s%> for your sons נָשִׁ֗ים <S%H802><s%> wives וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1323><s%> your daughters תְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> and give לַֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> to husbands וְתֵלַ֖דְנָה <S%H3205><s%> that they may bear בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> and daughters וּרְבוּ־ <S%H7235><s%> that ye may be increased שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּמְעָֽטוּ׃ <S%H4591><s%> there and not diminished

וְדִרְשׁ֞וּ <S%H1875><s%> And seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> the peace הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> I הִגְלֵ֤יתִי <S%H1540><s%> whither I have caused you to be carried away captives אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it וְהִתְפַּֽלְל֥וּ <S%H6419><s%> and pray בַעֲדָ֖הּ <S%H1157><s%> behalf אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> its בִשְׁלוֹמָ֔הּ <S%H7965><s%> for it for in the peace יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will have לָכֶ֖ם שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> thereof shall ye have peace פ

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֨ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יַשִּׁ֧יאוּ <S%H5377><s%> of you deceive לָכֶ֛ם נְבִֽיאֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H5030><s%> Let not your prophets אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֖ם <S%H7130><s%> that [be] in the midst וְקֹֽסְמֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H7080><s%> and your diviners וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> you neither hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חֲלֹמֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H2472><s%> to your dreams אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you מַחְלְמִֽים׃ <S%H2492><s%> which ye cause to be dreamed

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בְשֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> falsely הֵ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> they נִבְּאִ֥ים <S%H5012><s%> For they prophesy לָכֶ֖ם בִּשְׁמִ֑י <S%H8034><s%> unto you in my name לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁלַחְתִּ֖ים <S%H7971><s%> I have not sent נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> them saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When כֹה֙ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> When לְפִ֞י <S%H6310><s%> That after מְלֹ֧את <S%H4390><s%> be accomplished לְבָבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> at Babylon שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years אֶפְקֹ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> I will visit אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וַהֲקִמֹתִ֤י <S%H6965><s%> you and perform עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרִ֣י <S%H1697><s%> word הַטּ֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> my good לְהָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> toward you in causing you to return אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> to this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אָנֹכִ֨י <S%H595><s%> I יָדַ֜עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> For I know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּחֲשָׁבֹ֗ת <S%H4284><s%> the thoughts אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> that אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I חֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H2803><s%> that I think עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> toward you saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מַחְשְׁב֤וֹת <S%H4284><s%> thoughts שָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H7965><s%> of peace וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not לְרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> and not of evil לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָכֶ֖ם אַחֲרִ֥ית <S%H319><s%> end וְתִקְוָֽה׃ <S%H8615><s%> you an expected

וּקְרָאתֶ֤ם <S%H7121><s%> Then shall ye call אֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> וַֽהֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <S%H1980><s%> upon me and ye shall go וְהִתְפַּלַּלְתֶּ֖ם <S%H6419><s%> and pray אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me וְשָׁמַעְתִּ֖י <S%H8085><s%> unto me and I will hearken אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וּבִקַּשְׁתֶּ֥ם <S%H1245><s%> And ye shall seek אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> וּמְצָאתֶ֑ם <S%H4672><s%> me and find כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> when תִדְרְשֻׁ֖נִי <S%H1875><s%> [me] when ye shall search בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבַבְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3824><s%> for me with all your heart

וְנִמְצֵ֣אתִי <S%H4672><s%> And I will be found לָכֶם֮ נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> of you saith יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְשַׁבְתִּ֣י <S%H7725><s%> and I will turn away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [שְׁבִיתְכֶם כ] (שְׁבוּתְכֶ֗ם <S%H7622><s%> captive ק) וְקִבַּצְתִּ֣י <S%H6908><s%> and I will gather אֶ֠תְכֶם <S%H853><s%> מִֽכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֞ם <S%H1471><s%> you from all the nations וּמִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּקוֹמ֗וֹת <S%H4725><s%> and from all the places אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> I הִדַּ֧חְתִּי <S%H5080><s%> whither I have driven אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> you saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֣י <S%H7725><s%> and I will bring you again אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַ֨מָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> into the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> I הִגְלֵ֥יתִי <S%H1540><s%> whence I caused you to be carried away captive אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִשָּֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> Because אֲמַרְתֶּ֑ם <S%H559><s%> Because ye have said הֵקִ֨ים <S%H6965><s%> hath raised us up לָ֧נוּ יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD נְבִאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> prophets בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> in Babylon ס

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כֹ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> [Know] that thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> of the king הַיּוֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> that sitteth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and concerning כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> upon the throne דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and of all the people הַיּוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelleth בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> in this city הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲחֵיכֶ֕ם <S%H251><s%> [and] of your brethren אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יָצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> that are not gone forth אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> into בַּגּוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1473><s%> with you into captivity

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הִנְנִי֙ <S%H2005><s%> behold מְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> Behold I will send בָּ֔ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> upon them the sword אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> the famine וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֑בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and the pestilence וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> and will make אוֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> כַּתְּאֵנִים֙ <S%H8182><s%> them like vile הַשֹּׁ֣עָרִ֔ים <S%H8384><s%> figs אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot תֵאָכַ֖לְנָה <S%H398><s%> that cannot be eaten מֵרֹֽעַ׃ <S%H7455><s%> they are so evil
